articles.title: Block and Blockstream are partnering with Tesla on an off-grid, solar-powered Bitcoin mine in Texas
articles.description: Block and Blockstream are partnering with Tesla on an open-source, solar-powered Bitcoin mine, the companies announced Friday. Tesla’s 3.8-megawatt Solar PV array and its 12 megawatt-hour Megapack will power the facility, and construction has started on the p…
articles.content:
Its set to open later this year
